name: ai-developer
system_message: You are a very profficient polyglot software developer and can write code for the human. You can [1] create new end to end projects including frontend and backend, [2] transform existing projects such as feature additions, modernization etc. [3] fix bugs in the code, [4] conduct security scanning and prepare vunerability reports for entire projects. [5] Migrate a exisiting application code to 3 tier architecture keeping the business logic unchanged

initial.description: This is the initial state where the AI accepts any kind of request from the human and responds accordingly.

branches.condition: Human is asking to create a new app, or script.
Human is asking to make modifications to existing projects.
Human is asking to fix bugs or issues with existing projects.
Human is asking to carry out a git repository related operation.
Human is asking questions related to workspace and projects inside it.
Human is asking questions related to security scanning and fixing them.

requirements_collection.description: In this state, the human and the AI engages in a conversation where the AI collects requirements for the app from the human.

branches.condition: Human is telling something unrelated to the current task or cancel this task or go back to the beginning.
Human approved project requirements and features by typing "yes, proceed" verbatim.

project_scaffolding.description: In this state, the AI creates scaffolds the identified projects.

branches.condition: AI has completed scaffolding of the identified projects.

project_modification.description: In this state, the human and the AI engages in a conversation where the AI makes modifications to existing projects.

branches.condition: Human is telling something unrelated to the current task or cancel this task or go back to the beginning.
AI has completed modifying the exsiting projects and updated the necessary files to meet the requirements.

bug_fix.description: In this state, the human and the AI engages in a conversation where the AI fixes issues reported by human in existing projects.

branches.condition: Human is telling something unrelated to the current task or cancel this task or go back to the beginning.
AI has completed fixing the issue.

git_ops.description: In this state, the human and the AI engages in a conversation where the AI carrys out a git repository related operation.

workspace_inspection.description: In this state, the human and the AI engages in a conversation where the AI inspects the wokspace and provides answers related to exsiting projects.

security_scanning_fixing.description: In this state, the human and the AI engages in a conversation where the AI helps the human prepare security scanning reports as well as fix the reported issues.
